channel.title: Statistics on Science in Progress
channel.description: Recent content in Statistics on Science in Progress

item.title: #3 Nicholas Lyon - Research Talk
item.description: How can agricultural pastures be managed to support a community pollinators? Nicholas Lyon joins me on Science in Progress to chat about his research on this subject and much more. Nick is the first guest in a series of research talks we’ll record focused on the awesome research that student ecologists are conducting. Nick is a masters student at Iowa State University and did his undergraduate at the University of Puget Sound.
